description.zh: 先修課程：電子軟體系統或相當之課程數位訊號處理簡介，DSP架構與控制器硬體簡介，計時器、輸入捕捉、輸出比較，波寬調變，類比訊號轉換週邊功能與通訊架構介紹，DSP訊號處理與控制應用。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

description.zh: 快速原型加工原理、快速原型系統分類、加工參數與加工結果分析，製程設備研究，快速模具技術研究，快速原型與快速模具實習，專題研究與討論。
description.en: Principle of rapid prototyping, Classification of rapid prototyping systems, Analysis of manufacturing parameters and working results, Study of manufacturing equipments, Study of rapid tooling, Practice of rapid prototyping and rapid tooling, Special projects and discussion.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en: The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 1. fundamental metallographic concepts.2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.3. Hardenability 4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生瞭解服務特性、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務創新和策略等，期望公司未來能成為卓越經營之企業。 課程內容包含服務特性、服務傳送系統、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務業經營策略、服務創新和模式、個案討論等。
description.en: Service management and innovation is to discuss how to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept, Service delivery system, Service quality, Service strategy, Service innovation, Customer satisfaction, and Case study.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於將個體經濟學相關理論引用至企業管理決策上。討論主題包括供給與需求理論、市場需求預測、廠商理論、成本利潤分析、市場結構、定價策略與競爭者分析等議題。希望同學修習本課程後，更能瞭解如何利用經濟分析工具，更加精準並有效率地解決實務上所面臨的重要經營管理議題。
description.en: The course covers microeconomic concepts relevant to managerial decision-making. Topics include demand and supply analysis, consumer demand forecasting, production and cost analysis, market structure, pricing policies and competitor analysis. This course will help students to have a better understanding of the economic tools and their potential use for solving real-world problems.

name.zh: 顧客行為與互動行銷決策

description.zh: 顧客會購買某項產品，絕大部分的因素不是產品本身，而是「產品被賦予的意義」讓顧客認同。這表示，「與顧客的互動」，是交易進行的基本元素。電子商務的興起，讓互動行銷的重要性大增，透過網路，企業有了一個和顧客直接對話的空間。這帶來的是機會，也是挑戰。本課程在互動行銷方面，強調以顧客行為為出發點，用溝通觀點及體驗行銷觀點發展互動行銷策略，課程將以哈佛個案教學方式為主。
description.en: Customer buying  behavior on the interactive media is different with the traditional commercial environment. The topics include interactivity, and virtual experience. Topics of this course include: the economic of electronic market, customer buying behavior theory, virtual community, virtual experience, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship. Harvard Business School case method will be used.

name.zh: 全球企業協商談判與管理
name.en: Negotiation and Management in Global Business

description.zh: 從全球企業經營者觀點來探討協商談判的有關問題，目的在提供學生對協商談判專業知識的瞭解與管理，並熟悉協商談判的實務運用。協商談判是一種交易，是不斷發現問題的過程，也是集合策略與智慧的溝通藝術。全球企業協商談判即是在全球化市場上了解雙方需求，溝通折衝，解決衝突問題的過程。課程重心涵蓋談判的本質與觀念性架構，談判的理論與模型，談判的規劃、執行與控制，談判的策略與技能。上課方式以協商談判模式運作為主，並分組針對協商談判議題研討與討論。
description.en: The viewpoint of global business executive focus into the issues of negotiation. The objectives of this course are to provide understanding some of the core concepts of the negotiation and to acquaint application approach of the practice. Negotiation is a kind of trade and an on-going process of problem uncovering, as well as a communications art that synthesizes strategies and wisdoms. Accordingly, Global business negotiation and management is a process of mutual understanding, communicating, and conflicts and problems solving in the business. The negotiation topics cover nature, conceptual, framework, theory and model of negotiation  and  to analyze, plan, strategy, tactics, and implement successful negotiation. This can provide groups discussion and improve negotiate strategy.

notes: 林明杰1學分黃河明1學分胡幼研823胡幼圃（1.0）

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

name.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局
name.en: Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping

description.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局課程旨在教育學生對高科技、傳統與服務產業之屬性深入了解與培養策略規劃之核心能力，並且藉由跨領域實作課程中，學習技術布局流程，以培養科技大學學生進入職場之策略規劃與技術布局能力。課程包含六大新興、四大智慧、十大服務產業之策略規劃學理內涵、流程、技術研析與布局，並由案例說明導引分組討論與發表。
description.en: The purpose of the "Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping" class is to educate students to have the more insight capability on the Hi-Tech, Conventional, and Service Industries and to learn the processes of the strategic planning and technology road-mapping. This is also intent to assist the Technology University students to shorten their industry learning curve once they are hired. The class will introduce the Taiwan six emerging industries, four intelligent industries, and ten service industries including the background, justifications, process, and technology roadmap. Also, it will have the several case-studies to lead the student to do the exercise through the group discussion and present their findings and results.

description.zh: 檢查這具有價值和道德的建築社會和這身為建築師角色的扮演當進入這決策流程的建築的組織中時, 社會的視覺影像的檢驗及文化在社會文句具體化的呈現和他們相互的關係轉換到選擇性方案的設計都市的空間與地方。學生描述在社會的分析和設計理論考慮社會的思想如何落實設計和都市的空間的運作．學生將建議可能的理論的文句來達成上述之目標外同時證明他們對設計的提議是可被檢驗的。
description.en: Examines the values and ethics of an architectural society and the input of the architect into the decision-making process of an architectural organization.  An examination of visions of society and culture embodied in social texts and their relation to the design of alternative urban spaces and places.Students draw on social analysis and design theory to consider how social thought informs design and the production of urban space.  In addition, students suggest possible theoretical texts justifying their design proposals.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在探討自然與人文環境如何成就與限制人類聚落的型態與土地使用。因此本課程主要內容包括(1)早期聚落發展型態，(2)都市空間與視覺品質，(3)建築特質與其對都市的影響，(4)空間認知與環境心裡的影響，(5)影響未來都市發展與改變的因素。
description.en: For the aims to explore how the natural and cultural environment shapes and constrains the pattern of human settlement and land use, the course consists of (1) the growth of early settlement form, (2) spatial and visual qualities of cities, (3) the nature of architecture and its influence on urban form, (4) the influence of spatial perception and environmental psychology, (5) factors likely to influence future development and change in towns and cities.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在於讓研究所學生就建築構造與施工學們有進階性之認識、探討與操作。故包含講義授課、校外專家專業分享(結合雙師計畫)、實務課題分組操作等進行方式。廣義之建築構造應包含:建築材料應用、建築構法原理、設計與介面整合、建築生產與管理等面向，故本課程以上述關鍵詞進行為期十八周的訓練。期望訓練研究生具有獨立專業思考、整合技術、發掘現場課題、創出新生產手法之能力。
description.en: The planning of building system is an essential part of architectural planning. But it needs strengthen badly in our architecture study. In this course we use a systematic approach to handle the mechanism of integration in building systems, and the method of conduction, that may promote our design density and building quality. This course contents: Introduction of contemporary System Theory Divide and unify of building systems Concepts and methods of System Integration Cases and experiments of integration in building systems

description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。本課程亦將論及禪學觀念與管理的關聯性，提供學生一個東方觀點的管理藝術，幫助學生瞭解禪在企業管理應用的基本理念與價值；將禪的卓越智慧運用於公司的治理決策。學生們將被要求從事一項對目前工商界中具企業倫理公司治理的調查分析與評論。
description.en: This course discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity). This course will also discuss the relations between Zen and management. It introduces the Eastern management art to the students helping them understand how the concept and values of Zen can assist the decision-making in corporate governance.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎西班牙語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。培養學生簡易西文的溝通能力，提供學生西文的基礎知識(包括字母、讀音、語法等)，並增進學生對西班牙文化的認識與興趣。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language. By keeping their interests in studying Spanish, students are expected to have basic communicational skill, basic knowledge of Spanish language (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understanding of Spanish culture.

description.zh: 中文內容概述: 本課程著重通訊工程中多種與電磁波相關元件之分析與設計，包括各式通訊高頻組件分析、輻射特性與導波特性研究、以及其他新型微波與毫米波頻段之電路與天線
description.en: This purpose of this course is to design and analysis the key components in communication engineering by using electromagnetics. It includes the network analysis of various wireless communication components, investigations of electromagnetic waves in the bounded and unbounded region, and other novel circuits and antennas in microwave and millimeter-wave frequency.

description.zh: 課程從統計模式(迴歸分析)、概率、再進入隨遇變數、概率分佈、分佈曲線種類、樣品分佈、統計評估及統計測試等核心。
description.en: The contents of this course are statistical modeling (regression analysis)、probability, random variables and probability distributions, important probability distribution in engineering, sampling  distributions, statistical estimation and statistical testing.

description.zh: 模內塗裝(IMD)技術是把塗裝薄膜(decorative film)預置在模具型腔(cavity)內，接著再將熔膠射入型腔內薄膜的內側，即可生產最後完成的零件且在零件表面覆上塗裝薄膜上的圖案。此製程廣泛應用在3C產品，對於增進產品外觀的表面塗裝，提供降低成本有效的方法，因為不需要作二次印刷。然而此一製程需要考慮額外的設備成本、塗裝薄膜材料生產、薄膜精確定位、與模具設計等。這門課對於機械系學生將來要從事產品開發、製程設計是一門非常重要的課程。
description.en: In-mold decoration (IMD) comprises insertion of a film or foil into the cavity, followed by injection of polymer melts on the inner side of the insert to produce a part with the final finish defined by the decorative film/foil. This process is used to produce 3C product, and provides a cost-effective way of surface decoration that enhances the appearance of product, because no post treatment is needed. However, this process must consider the extra additional equipment cost, decorative film material, film positioning, and mold design. This course is very important for a mechanical department student who works about product development and manufacturing process design in the future.
